attributes.action: Make a change in the law
attributes.additional_details: A lot of the time when someone makes a serious Allegation there word is often taken as there seen as the victim where as  in the real world if its 100 percent investigated and evidence is not there and the person has a history of making similar allegations before how can you protect someone elses humans rights from scrutiny and violation without some sort of safeguarding like innocent until proven guilty if not  it then becomes a very one sided story there  needs to be a change
attributes.background: There needs to be a change in scottish law To make it Mandatory that anyone  who gives false rape claims there needs to be 100 percent Evidence for charges to be brought. Also for anyone that has made similar allegations before they need to be charged

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
